page.title: 09HOME LIFE
page.content: At home we have our certain jobs to do. I have to get tea, wash the dishes and make the beds. My family lives on a farm. In our home we have two kitchens, three sitting rooms, two bath rooms, one larder and five bedrooms. On our farm we keep dairy cows, beef cattle, sheep and lambs for meat and wool. We have cereals or fry for breakfast. Fry is eggs, bacon, sausages and mashed potatoes. Eggs come from hens, bacon comes from an animal called a pig and sausages are also made with meat from a pig. For dinner we have roast meat and vegetables and for tea we have pasty, cakes, tart or in summer strawberries and cream. For supper we have crisps.
